StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetRequest]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @RequestId uniqueidentifier ) AS
BEGIN
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
SELECT R.RequestId, R.OriginatorUserId, RT.RequestTypeId, RT.RequestType, RT.XsdFileName, RS.RequestApprovalStatus, R.RequestDate, R.RequestXML, RA.Comments FROM USMC.Request R JOIN USMC.RequestType RT ON RT.RequestTypeID = R.RequestTypeId LEFT OUTER JOIN USMC.RequestApproval RA ON RA.RequestId = R.RequestId LEFT OUTER JOIN USMC.RequestApprovalStatus RS ON RS.RequestApprovalStatusId = RA.RequestApprovalStatusId WHERE R.RequestId = @RequestId
END
